name: Looops
description:
Between every LOOOPS, your best highscore is hidden!

On LOOOPS, you must have timing and be accurate to go further and beat your highscore!

Credits
Programming and Game Design - Welliton Souza (@Wellzitu)
Art and Sound - Ricardo niclas (@Ricniclas)

How to Play
Left Mouse Button only

Game made for IZTECH Hyper Casual Game Jam by Earth Defenders Team.

Thanks for all your support!

LINK FOR GITHUB:  https://github.com/Wellzitux/Looops
